summary.span: 命名空间包含用于生成安全令牌服务 （STS） 的类。

span.span: The namespace contains classes that are used to build security token services (STS).

summary.span: 其中包括 和 类，以及一些实用工具类提供执行 cookie 转换的异常的能力。

span.span: These include the and classes, as well as exception several utility classes that provide the ability to perform cookie transforms.
